review: Little difficult to get set, but once its up and running, it's amazing

review: this was a big hit at xmas . my son loved it. not often when a child really likes a xmas gift but this worked well once we discovered my router needed an update, so i was pleased also as our printer and netflix were not working properly and with the chromecast i probably would not have thought of the router fix.

review: Great product. I have enjoyed the chromecast. So much so that I have bought one for my family and for my apartment. It's a great investment if you don't have a gaming console or a way to watch Netflix and other things like that.
